document_data.name: ''Wind Fan''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''wind fan''''' was a [[magic item]] capable of creating a strong burst of wind.
document_data.Description: These items were made of wood, papyrus, and cloth.
document_data.Powers: When the proper [[command word]] was uttered, using the ''wind fan'' released an effect similar to a ''[[gust of wind]]''. This could be done once per day without risk, but more frequent use of a ''wind fan'' risked breaking it. Some models could not be used again until the recharged during the next dawn.

Notable Owners.Individuals: * [[Coriolis Rillevay]], a [[gnome]] [[sorcerer]] and [[adventurer]] from [[Waterdeep]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
Notable Owners.Religions: * [[Goldeye]]s, the [[specialty priest]]s of [[Waukeen]], had a chance of receiving an ''fur of warmth'' as one of the magic items they were given upon their admission to the clergy.
